first_para: David Roy Lidington PC (born 30 June 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician, who has been Member of Parliament for Aylesbury since 1992. He is currently a Minister of State at the Foreign Office, serving as Minister for Europe. This responsibility includes the overseas territories of Gibraltar and Akrotiri and Dhekelia.

full.extract: David Roy Lidington PC (born 30 June 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician, who has been Member of Parliament for Aylesbury since 1992. He is currently a Minister of State at the Foreign Office, serving as Minister for Europe. This responsibility includes the overseas territories of Gibraltar and Akrotiri and Dhekelia.
full.title: David Lidington
